responses.content: A framework to enable quick app building
responses.author: E

responses.content: Experiment with it. You'll find out

questions.content: What is a template for in ember?
questions.author: I

responses.content: It serves as user interface which is used to pass information through.
responses.author: T

questions.content: What is the route handler for?
questions.author: RD

responses.content: The route handler interprets the data being passed into it and destroys and creates entries in the model.
responses.author: E

responses.content: It acts like a back end interface in modular form.
responses.author: F
